centurion:BatheInBlood.NAME: Bathe in Blood
centurion:BatheInBlood.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to all enemies centurion:Bleed. NL Exhaust.

centurion:BeatDown.NAME: Beat Down
centurion:BeatDown.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Quest: Deal !M! damage. NL centurion:Reward: Transform a Strike card into an Ultimate Strike. Upgrades are preserved.

centurion:BladeWork.NAME: Blade Work
centurion:BladeWork.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack gain 2 Block.
centurion:BladeWork.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an Attack gain 2 Block.

centurion:BladeStorm.NAME: Blade Storm
centurion:BladeStorm.DESCRIPTION: Play the last Attack you played this turn X times.
centurion:BladeStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the last Attack you played this turn X+1 times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (You haven't played an Attack this turn.)

centurion:BloodDrive.NAME: Blood Drive
centurion:BloodDrive.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Quest: Deal !M! centurion:Bleed damage. NL centurion:Reward: Discover a rare card to gain.

centurion:BloodRush.NAME: Blood Rush
centurion:BloodRush.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn centurion:Filter for each 2 cards you played that turn.

centurion:BringItOn.NAME: Bring It On
centurion:BringItOn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter and draw a card for each enemy.

centurion:Burst.NAME: Burst
centurion:Burst.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter !M!. Gain [E] for each card discarded. Draw the cards not discarded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to discard. Gain energy for each card discarded. Draw the cards not discarded.

centurion:Caution.NAME: Caution
centurion:Caution.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card.

centurion:CutInHalf.NAME: Cut In Half
centurion:CutInHalf.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses 50% of their current HP.

centurion:Dagger.NAME: Dagger
centurion:Dagger.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 2 Attacks in a single turn, gain !M! centurion:Razor.

centurion:DexterityUp.NAME: Dexterity Up
centurion:DexterityUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Dexterity at the start of every combat. NL Fleeting.

centurion:DiamondEdgedBlade.NAME: Diamond Edged Blade
centurion:DiamondEdgedBlade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! centurion:Razor.

centurion:Doom.NAME: Doom
centurion:Doom.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

centurion:DoubleStrike.NAME: Double Strike
centurion:DoubleStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 Quick Strike to your hand.
centurion:DoubleStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 Upgraded Quick Strike to your hand.

centurion:Draw1000.NAME: Draw!
centurion:Draw1000.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Quest: Draw !M! cards. NL centurion:Reward: An upgraded Burst.

centurion:DualWieldStance.NAME: Dual Wield
centurion:DualWieldStance.DESCRIPTION: SoulBound. Innate. NL centurion:Equip an offhand weapon: Sword, Dagger, or a Mace. NL Purge.
centurion:DualWieldStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: SoulBound. Innate. NL centurion:Equip an Upgraded offhand weapon: Sword, Dagger, or a Mace. NL Purge.

centurion:Enhancement.NAME: Enhancement
centurion:Enhancement.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Enhance a card in your hand at random.
centurion:Enhancement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Enhance a card in your hand.

centurion:EnhancingShield.NAME: Enhancing Shield
centurion:EnhancingShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL centurion:Enhance this card. NL For each Enhancement, Enhance a random Skill in your draw pile.

centurion:EnhancingStrike.NAME: Enhancing Strike
centurion:EnhancingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL centurion:Enhance this card. NL For each Enhancement, Enhance a random Attack in your draw pile.

centurion:FatalBlow.NAME: Fatal Blow
centurion:FatalBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Retain !centurion:RETAIN!: when retained damage is doubled.

centurion:Focus.NAME: Focus
centurion:Focus.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter 4X. NL For each Skill, Attack, and Power card discarded; respectively gain 2 Block, deal 2 damage to all enemies, or gain [E] .
centurion:Focus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter 4(X+1). NL For each Skill, Attack, and Power card discarded; respectively gain 2 Block, deal 2 damage to all enemies, or gain [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to discard. For each Skill, Attack, and Power card discarded; respectively gain 2 Block, deal 2 damage to all enemies, or gain [E] .

centurion:Gloom.NAME: Gloom
centurion:Gloom.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

centurion:GloomAndDoom.NAME: Doom and Gloom
centurion:GloomAndDoom.DESCRIPTION: Add a Doom and a Gloom to your hand. NL Exhaust.
centurion:GloomAndDoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Doom and an upgraded Gloom to your hand. NL Exhaust.

centurion:HealthUp.NAME: Health Up
centurion:HealthUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Raise your max HP by !M!. NL Fleeting.

centurion:HeavyBlow.NAME: Heavy Blow
centurion:HeavyBlow.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Heavy !M!. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Retain. When retained gain !centurion:SecondMagic! centurion:Heavy. NL Exhaust.

centurion:HiddenMove.NAME: Hidden Move
centurion:HiddenMove.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter !M!. NL Each card discarded is exhausted. Each card not discarded is played. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to discard. Each discarded is exhausted. Each card not discarded is played.

centurion:InTheZone.NAME: In the Zone
centurion:InTheZone.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain [E] . NL Retain. When retained this costs 1 less.

centurion:KnockBack.NAME: Knock Back
centurion:KnockBack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

centurion:LightHeal.NAME: Light Heal
centurion:LightHeal.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Heal for !M!% of your Max HP. NL Fleeting.

centurion:Mace.NAME: Mace
centurion:Mace.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 2 Attacks in a single turn, apply !M! Weak.

centurion:MarkOfDeath.NAME: MarkOfDeath
centurion:MarkOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Death Mark. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

centurion:MassEnhance.NAME: Mass Enhance
centurion:MassEnhance.DESCRIPTION: Enhance all your Strike and Shield cards. NL Exhaust.
centurion:MassEnhance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enhance all your Strike and Shield cards. NL centurion:Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

centurion:OpeningManeuver.NAME: Opening Maneuver
centurion:OpeningManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add to your hand a Strike or a Shield card with centurion:Enhance !M!. NL Exhaust.

centurion:OpportuneStrike.NAME: Opportune Strike
centurion:OpportuneStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Block instead for each unblocked damage you are receiving. NL (Gain !M! Block)

centurion:Patience.NAME: Patience
centurion:Patience.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Ultimate Strike into your draw pile. Can be upgraded any number of times.
centurion:Patience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! Ultimate Strikes into your draw pile. Can be upgraded any number of times.

centurion:PushOnward.NAME: Push Onward
centurion:PushOnward.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. Gain [E] for each card discarded.

centurion:PowerUp.NAME: Power Up
centurion:PowerUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Permanently upgrade a random card. NL Fleeting.
centurion:PowerUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Permanently upgrade a random card. Favours rarer cards. NL Fleeting.

centurion:Probe.NAME: Probe
centurion:Probe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card.

centurion:Quicksilver.NAME: Quicksilver
centurion:Quicksilver.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose 1 Attack card. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
centurion:Quicksilver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose 2 Attack cards. They cost 0 this turn. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

centurion:MurderAllTheThings.NAME: Murder All The Things
centurion:MurderAllTheThings.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Twice.

centurion:ReadyShield.NAME: Ready Shield
centurion:ReadyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL Retain. When retained decrease Block by 1 for this combat.

centurion:Reap.NAME: Reap
centurion:Reap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the damage for each Death Mark. NL Remove 1 Death Mark or Exhaust.

centurion:ReapAndSow.NAME: Reap and Sow
centurion:ReapAndSow.DESCRIPTION: Add a Reap and a Sow to your hand. NL Exhaust.
centurion:ReapAndSow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Reap and an upgraded Sow to your hand. NL Exhaust.

centurion:Reminisce.NAME: Reminisce
centurion:Reminisce.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discarded Innate cards. NL At the start of your turn, centurion:Fetch a random Innate card from your draw pile.
centurion:Reminisce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discarded Innate cards. NL At the start of your turn, centurion:Fetch an Innate card from your draw pile.

centurion:RepeatingStrike.NAME: Repeating Strike
centurion:RepeatingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL Double the damage of Repeating Strikes played this turn.

centurion:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
centurion:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: When you centurion:Filter and discard a card, gain 2 Block.
centurion:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you centurion:Filter and discard a card, gain 2 Block.

centurion:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
centurion:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn gain !M! Thorns.

centurion:ShiftingPlan.NAME: Shifting Plan
centurion:ShiftingPlan.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. When retained transform into a random Attack or Skill card, that keeps this ability.
centurion:ShiftingPlan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Retain. When retained transform into a random Upgraded Attack or Skill card, that keeps this ability.

centurion:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice and Dice
centurion:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Add a Slice and a Dice to your hand. NL Exhaust.
centurion:SliceAndDice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Slice and an upgraded Dice to your hand. NL Exhaust.

centurion:SlowBurn.NAME: Slow Burn
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Retain 1. When retained gain [E] next turn.

centurion:Smith.NAME: Smith
centurion:Smith.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter !M!. Each card discarded is upgraded for the rest of combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose cards to discard. Cards discarded are upgraded for the rest of combat.

centurion:Sow.NAME: Sow
centurion:Sow.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 Marks of Death into your discard pile.
centurion:Sow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle 5 Marks of Death into your discard and draw piles.

centurion:Stagger.NAME: Stagger
centurion:Stagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain block equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

centurion:StatsUp.NAME: Stats Up
centurion:StatsUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength and !centurion:SecondMagic! Dexterity at the start of every combat. NL Fleeting.

centurion:StrengthUp.NAME: Strength Up
centurion:StrengthUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength at the start of every combat. NL Fleeting.

centurion:WeightedStrike.NAME: Weighted Strike
centurion:WeightedStrike.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Heavy !M!. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain 1 Strength.

centurion:WindForm.NAME: Wind Form
centurion:WindForm.DESCRIPTION: The first Attack card you play each turn is played twice.
centurion:WindForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! Attack cards you play each turn are played twice.

centurion:Wish.NAME: Wish
centurion:Wish.DESCRIPTION: Choose a X-1 cost card to add to your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
centurion:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a X-1 cost upgraded card to add to your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no cards available at this cost.

centurion:WitheringStrike.NAME: Withering Strike
centurion:WitheringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Then deal the damage halved until 1 damage is dealt.

centurion:TwoHandedStance.NAME: Two Handed
centurion:TwoHandedStance.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL centurion:Equip a new weapon: Greatsword, Battle Axe, or a Warhammer. NL Purge.
centurion:TwoHandedStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL centurion:Equip an Upgraded weapon: Greatsword, Battle Axe, or a Warhammer. NL Purge.

centurion:Sword.NAME: Sword
centurion:Sword.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 Quick Strike into your hand.
centurion:Sword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 Upgraded Quick Strike into your hand.

centurion:SwordShieldStance.NAME: Sword & Shield
centurion:SwordShieldStance.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL centurion:Equip a better shield: Tower, Spiked, or Warded. NL Purge.
centurion:SwordShieldStance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL centurion:Equip a better and Upgraded shield: Tower+, Spiked+, or Warded+. NL Purge.

centurion:Anticipate.NAME: Anticipate
centurion:Anticipate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If an enemy intends to NOT attack, gain double that Block next turn.

centurion:BlurredBlade.NAME: Blurred Blade
centurion:BlurredBlade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! centurion:Razor. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
centurion:BlurredBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! centurion:Razor. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice.

centurion:CounterOffensive.NAME: Counter Offensive
centurion:CounterOffensive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Thorns until the start of your next turn.

centurion:Prepared.NAME: Prepared
centurion:Prepared.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. centurion:Filter for the amount of Block gained.

centurion:Reconnaissance.NAME: Reconnaissance
centurion:Reconnaissance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL centurion:Filter for the amount of damage dealt.

centurion:StrategicCut.NAME: Strategic Cut
centurion:StrategicCut.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! centurion:Razor. Increase centurion:Razor centurion:Bleed by !centurion:SecondMagic! for this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

centurion:TrustyAxe.NAME: Trusty Axe
centurion:TrustyAxe.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If you have centurion:Razor increase centurion:Bleed by 1 for this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

centurion:TrustyShield.NAME: Trusty Shield
centurion:TrustyShield.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to a random enemy.

centurion:BleedOut.NAME: Bleed Out
centurion:BleedOut.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 centurion:Razor. Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has centurion:Bleed, trigger it.
centurion:BleedOut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 centurion:Razor. Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has centurion:Bleed, trigger it twice.

centurion:BloodSpirit.NAME: Blood Spirit
centurion:BloodSpirit.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to Buff, gain !M! Strength. Draw a card.

centurion:CounterAttack.NAME: Counter Attack
centurion:CounterAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, double the damage.

centurion:Defiance.NAME: Defiance
centurion:Defiance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL centurion:Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

centurion:Execution.NAME: Execution
centurion:Execution.DESCRIPTION: Retain. centurion:Heavy !M!. NL Deal !D! Damage, if this kills an enemy, permanently increase this card's centurion:Heavy by !centurion:SecondMagic!. NL Exhaust.

centurion:GatherBandages.NAME: Gather Bandages
centurion:GatherBandages.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If your have lost HP this combat, shuffle !M! Bandage Up into your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

centurion:Observe.NAME: Observe
centurion:Observe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Dexterity. NL centurion:Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

centurion:Search.NAME: Search
centurion:Search.DESCRIPTION: centurion:Filter !M!. Draw a card. NL centurion:Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

centurion:Setup.NAME: Setup
centurion:Setup.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

centurion:BrightBeginning.NAME: Bright Beginning
centurion:BrightBeginning.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Reduce the cost of all Innate cards in your hand to 0 this turn.
centurion:BrightBeginning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Reduce the cost of all Innate cards in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

centurion:DefensiveWhirlwind.NAME: Defensive Whirlwind
centurion:DefensiveWhirlwind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block this turn, draw a card.

centurion:WhirlingBlade.NAME: Whirling Blade
centurion:WhirlingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, draw a card.

centurion:UltimateStrike.NAME: Ultimate Strike
centurion:UltimateStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

centurion:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
centurion:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

centurion:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
centurion:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
centurion:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

centurion:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
centurion:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

centurion:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
centurion:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !centurion:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

centurion:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
centurion:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !centurion:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
